resources.string:
Program 1 


 1st Day, Sunday 17.8.2014

Arrival to Ljubljana

18.00-20.00 Info desk and Get to know each other/Taste Slovenia 

 2nd Day, Monday 18.8.2014

9.30-10.00 (LR P14) Info desk, Faculty and Library tour

10.00-12.15 (LR P14)) Opening ceremony

12.30-13.30 Lunch in dormitory

14.00-17.00 (LR P05) Module 1: English Language for Academic Purposes - English as a Common Tool for Multidisciplinary Exchange

18.00 Social programme - International village 

 3rd Day, Tuesday 19.8.2014

9.00-12.00 (LR P14) Module 2: Public Services in the EU ? Administrative System, Legislation and Governance

12.00-13.00 Lunch in dormitory

13.00-16.00 (LR P05) Module 3: Legal and Social Aspects of EU in Crisis

17.00 Social programme - Snaga visit and Ljubljana's City tour 

 4th Day, Wednesday 20.8.2014

08.30-12.00 (2,5 hours) Study visit to Municipality/Administrative unit Koper

12.00-18.00 Free time in Piran 

 5th Day, Thursday 21.8.2014

9.00-12.00 (LR P14) Module 2: Public Services in the EU ? Administrative System, Legislation and Governance

12.00-13.00 Lunch in dormitory

16.10 Social programme: Experience Eco 

 6th Day, Friday 22.8.2014

9.00-12.00 (LR P14, P10,P11) Module 4: Pan-European ICT Challenges in Public Administration

12.00-13.00 Lunch in dormitory

13.00-17.30 (LR P10,P11,P12) Module 4: Pan-European ICT Challenges in Public Administration

19.00 Social programme - Traditional dance and karaoke 

 7th Day, Saturday 23.8.2014

Excursion to the alpine pearl Bled 

 8th Day, Sunday 24.8.2014

Free day 

 9th Day, Monday 25.8.2014

9.00-12.00 (LR P05) Module 3: Legal and Social Aspects of EU in Crisis

12.00-13.00 Lunch in dormitory

13.00-14.30 (LR P10,P11,P12) Module 4: Pan-European ICT Challenges in Public Administration

14.30-16.00 (LR P10,P11,P12) Module 4: Pan-European ICT Challenges in Public Administration

17.00 Social programme: Traditional Ljubljana's hike on "Šmarna gora" 

 10th Day, Tuesday 26.8.2014

9.00-12.00 (LR P05) Module 5: EU and its Influence on National Tax Systems

12.00-13.00 Lunch in dormitory

13.00-16.00 (LR P05) Module 5: EU and its Influence on National Tax Systems

18.00 Social programme - Beach volley 

 11th Day, Wednesday 27.8.2014

9.00-12.00 (LR P05) Module 6: Public Choice - Politics and Policy Issues in the EU Countries

12.00-13.00 Lunch in dormitory

13.00-16.00 (LR P05) Module 6: Public Choice - Politics and Policy Issues in the EU Countries 

 12th Day, Thursday 28.8.2014

10.00-12.00 (2,5 hours) Study visit in Ljubljana (Municipality and Center of Excellence in Finance)

12.00-13.00 Lunch

13.00-16.00 (LR P10,P11,P12) Group Preparation for the final exam 

 13th Day, Friday 29.8.2014

9.00-12.00 (LR P05, P10, P11) Presentation and discussion of practical works, final written exam

12.30-13.30 Lunch in "Šumi" restaurant

13.30-14.30 (LR P14) Closing ceremony 

 14th Day, Saturday 30.8.2014

Departure

Contacts

 Phone: +386 1 5805 530


 
 Anja Dimič Andlovič
 00386 41 313 922
 
 
 University of Ljubljana
 Faculty of Administration
 Gosarjeva ulica 5
 1000 Ljubljana
 


Helpful links:

Official website: http://www.fu.uni-lj.si

Official FB page: https://www.facebook.com/fasummerschool

Eduroam Wi-Fi: http://www.arnes.si/en/helpdesk/eduroam/instructions-on-establishing-a-connection.html

Moodle e-classroom: https://e-izobrazevanje.fu.uni-lj.si/

Glossary 



Good afternoon – Dober dan


Good evening – Dober večer


Hello – Živijo

context.startActivity(intent);
Welcome – Dobrodošli


Goodbye - Nasvidenje


My name is – Ime mi je


Nice to meet you – Me veseli


Do you speak English? – Govorite angleško?


I don't speak Slovenian – Ne govorim slovensko.


Yes/No – Ja/Ne


How are you? – Kako si?


Good – Dobro


I would like to order – Rad/a bi naročil/a


I am a vegetarian – Sem vegetarijanec / vegetarijanka


I don't eat pork – Ne jem svinjine


Enjo your meal – Dober tek


Thank you – Hvala


Cheers – Na zdravje


Excuse me – Oprostite


The check, please – Račun, prosim


It was delicious – Bilo je odlično


Water – voda


Beer – pivo


Salt – sol


Cash – Denar


Card - Kartica


I need help – Potrebujem pomoč


Where is... – Kje je ...


Bathroom – kopalnica


Toilet - Stranišče


Dormitory – Študentski dom


Bus station – Avtobusna postaja


Train station – Železniška postaja


You are beautiful – Lep/a si


Can I get your number? – Lahko dobim tvojo številko?


What do you drink? – Kaj piješ?


What are you doing? – Kaj počneš?


I love you – Ljubim te


Wow, that is beautiful – Vau, to je lepo


I adore this country – Obožujem to deželo

string.name: google_address
string.a: Faculty of Administration address: Gosarjeva ulica 5, 1000 Ljubljana

resources.string:
FASS Photo Contest 


 Obligatory hashtags: #FASS #summerschool

 3 categories on Facebook and Instagram account:
 #eco #funny #touristic 


 FB: https://www.facebook.com/fasummerschool 



INSTAGRAM

 1. Follow us on Instagram @fasummerschool
 http://instagram.com/fasummerschool
 Title #FASS #summerschool #eco.

 Each student/lecturer can submit only one photo per category. 


 When?

 17.8. (9 a.m.) ? 28.8. (11 a.m.).
 At the end we will choose:


3 winners (1 winner per each category) on Facebook official page: Faculty of Administration Summer School

3 winners (1 winner per each category) on Instagram account @fasummerschool

 The winners will get an attractive award/prize.
